import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import { LOGGED_IN } from '../../redux/actions/authActions'; class Profile extends Component { render() { this.props.LOGGED_IN(); const {auth}=this.props; if(!auth.token) return return (

); } } const mapStatetoProps=(state)=>{ return{ auth:state.auth } } export default connect(mapStatetoProps)(Profile);
